Pulse detection using Dietrich (2004)

Source: R/pulseDetection_dietrich.R
pd_dietrich2004.Rd

Detects pulses in a Wave using the method described in Dietrich et al (2004) doi:10.1016/j.patcog.2004.04.004.

Usage

pd_dietrich2004(
  wave,
  U = 120,
  gamma = 0.05,
  alpha = 1.4,
  scaling = 32,
  V = 480,
  psi = 1
)

Arguments

wave

A Wave object

U

Window length

gamma

Gamma

alpha

Alpha

scaling

Scaling

V

V Window length

psi

Psi

Value

A list of input values plus the onset and offset times of pulses
